meta.title: Minnetonka Public Schools | Innovate. Inspire. Excel.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Minnetonka Public Schools is a high performing K-12 Minnesota school district proudly serving families in all or part of 10 communities.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Minnetonka Public Schools, best school district, top school in Minnesota, high school, District 276, Spanish immersion, Chinese immersion
Minnetonka Public Schools is a high performing K-12 Minnesota school district proudly serving families in all or part of 10 communities.
Minnetonka Public Schools | Innovate. Inspire. Excel.

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home district fsHasTheme2

li.a: Bradley G. Board Award for Excellence in Elementary Education
Charlie Parnell Memorial Award for Excellence in Special Education
MCE Volunteer and Business Partner Awards
Fourth, Fifth and Sixth Grade Choir
Minnetonka Stadium Buy a Brick Fundraiser
2019 PTA/PTO-Sponsored Minnetonka School Board Candidate Forum
A Day in the Life of a Kindergartner
Technology Resources for Parents of Middle Schoolers
MHS Drop Off and Pick Up Instructions

div.p: The mission of the Minnetonka School District is to ensure all students envision and pursue their highest aspirations while serving the greater good. In a community that transcends traditional definitions of excellence, we use learning and teaching as tools to value and nurture each person, inspire in everyone a passion to excel with confidence and hope, and instill expectations that stimulate extraordinary achievement in the classroom and in life.
View the calendar of events for the District, as well as each school, the athletics schedule, release days and more.

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList news-box fsItemCount_1 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailFull

img.alt: Minnetonka Schools Names Amy LaDue as Assistant Superintendent for Instruction

div.a: Minnetonka Schools Names Amy LaDue as Assistant Superintendent for Instruction

div.p: Minnetonka Public Schools has named Amy LaDue as Assistant Superintendent for Instruction. LaDue begins her new position on July 1, 2020.

article.a: Read more about Minnetonka Schools Names Amy LaDue as Assistant Superintendent for Instruction

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList news-box fsItemCount_1 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailFull

img.alt: Minnetonka Schools Honored for 25 Years of Financial Transparency

div.a: Minnetonka Schools Honored for 25 Years of Financial Transparency

div.p: Minnetonka Public Schools has been honored with the Certificate of Excellence in Financial Reporting by the Association of School Business Officials International for the 25th consecutive year.

article.a: Read more about Minnetonka Schools Honored for 25 Years of Financial Transparency

div.class: fsElement fsNews fsList news-box fsItemCount_1 fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailFull

div.p: Even before e-learning officially began, teachers at MHS and around the district were already making an effort to stay connected with students.

article.a: Read more about Teachers Stay Connected

div.p: 99% of parents rate the education provided by the Minnetonka School District as excellent or good
94% of parents tell us our community receives a good value from its investment in local public schools
Recognized by NAMM for our outstanding commitment to music education

img.alt: Class of 2018 averaged a 27.5 on the ACT
img.title: 27.8 Average ACT Score

div.p: Average ACT score for the class of 2019
Ranked #1 Public School District in Minnesota according to niche.com
We have 11,084 K-12 students enrolled in Minnetonka schools
Minnetonka H.S. is an International Baccalaureate (IB) World School
Apple Distinguished Program award for our 1:1 iPad program
